## Bio 

I am a Senior Statistician at LAPOP Lab at Vanderbilt University, where I coordinate nationwide surveys in four countries, lead data visualization tasks, present results for non-technical audiences, and head lab research on statistics and survey methodology. I have experience with in R, Stata, Tableau, SQL, and Python, and I excel at project management and written communication.
